name: 曾恕銘
objective: 本課程介紹無線傳輸技術的基礎和最新發展，內容包含訊號與系統基礎，數位通訊基礎，行動通訊基礎，CDMA，資料偵測和干擾消除，MIMO (spatial multiplexing/spatial transmit diversity/beamforming)， OFDMA，排隊理論，4G MIMO傳輸模式/5G願景和NOMA(non-orthogonal multiple access)。
schedule:
1.　　Signals and linear systems
2.  Digital communications (including random processes, linear algebra)
3.　　Mobile communication fundamentals (cellular system, propagation model, diversity)
4.　　CDMA
5.　　Data detection/interference cancellation for CDMA etc.
6.　　MIMO(Spatial Multiplexing/MU-MIMO/STBC/distributed STBC/beamforming) 
7.　　OFDM(A) (principle/synchronization/channel estimation)
8.　　Traffic Theories (Poisson arrivals, 排隊理論)
9.　　4G Overview/MIMO Modes/Link Adaption, 5G Vision and NOMA (Non-orthogonal multiple access)
scorePolicy:
Oral report 1 (part of handouts): 20%
Midterm Exam: 50% 
Oral report  2 (a paper about 4G/5G transmission technology: OFDMA, MIMO,MU-MIMO, MIMO precoding, open-loop/close-loop spatial multiplexing/spatial diversity, D2D communications, Cooperation/relaying communication, Non-orthogonal multiple access): 30%
materials:
Textbooks: None
References:
(4G MIMO modes Link Adaption) Houman Zarrinkoub, Understanding LTE with MATLAB: From Mathematical Modeling to Simulation and Prototyping, Wiley, 2014, ch6-7
(行動通訊基礎)Stuber, Mobile Communications, Kluwer, 2001, ch. 1,2,6
(排隊理論)D. P. Agrawal and Q. Zeng, Introduction to Wireless and Mobile Systems, CENGAGE learning, 4/e, 2014 (ch 2,8)
